page.title: 18HOME LIFE DAILY ROUTINE
page.content: I get up at 7.15 every morning except Sunday. I go down take a cup out of the cupboard make myself a drink then go back upstairs. I get dressed and sort out my bag. Then I go and have breakfast. I then wash and clean my teeth and brush my hair. I play with my dog then go to knock for my friend. We get to school at about 8.45. At the start of school I go to my form room, first lesson is at 9, the next starts at 10 and break is at 11. The lesson after break finishes at dinner time which lasts for an hour. Afternoon school is 1.05 to 3.35. I wait for my friend and we walk home together. She waits at my house while I change then we go to her house and play. At about 6 I go home for tea after which I take my dog for a walk. I then play outside with friends till about 9. I then read, watch TV, do homework and go to bed.
